Reference

Habitat Functions

Functions that create habitat estimates given flow and some additional helper functions.

set_spawning_habitat()

Set Spawning Habitat Area

set_instream_habitat()

Set Instream Habitat Area

set_floodplain_habitat()

Set Floodplain Habitat Area

set_bypass_habitat()

Set Bypass Habitat Area

wua_to_area()

WUA to Area in Square Meters

apply_suitability()

Apply Suitability Factor

square_meters_to_acres()

Square Meters to Acres

acres_to_square_meters()

Acres to Square Meters

get_weeks_flooded()

Duration of Floodplain Inundation

get_habitat_selector()

Get Habitat Selector
